item.title: Report E-2025010145
item.description:
Report E-2025010145

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-27
  • City: Long Island City
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: CARRIER IS INDIVIDUAL
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During Flight 2777, BOS-LAS, tail number N978JB, customer Isabel Marino (smarino@gpimodels.com) told inflight their E-cigarette got extremely hot during flight. Inflight placed it in aft restroom trash can submerged in water. Aircraft landed with no further action required. Device was removed from the aircraft by Safety and placed in the flammable cabinet awaiting inspection by FAA.
